name: Plugg
description: Use of sparse and compact drum and hi-hat patterns, subby 808s and heavy low end; commonly features piano samples, airy pads, and icy synths.

children.name: Ambient Plugg
children.description: Strong atmosphere and texture taken from Ambient music; featuring tight drums and minimal low-end and 808s.

children.name: Dark Plugg
children.description: Ominous, sinister synth pads and lead melodies, skittering hi-hats, and fast percussion and snare rolls.

children.name: PluggnB
children.description: Emphasizes more melodic and layered synth leads, denser and faster drum programming, and a lesser reliance on the laid-back, minimalistic atmosphere of earlier Plugg styles.

children.name: Terror Plugg
children.description: Harsher and noisier, with 808s distorted to create a high-frequency sound.
